<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Add Rule to Security Group</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/securitygroups/{securitygroup_id}/add_rule"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Add a rule to the settings in specified security group identified by ID in user's account.
